slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseSignerClient/experimental_addToMultiOwner
---

This will add additional members to an existing multi-sig account

## Import

```ts
import { BaseSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### orgId

`string`
orgId of the multi-sig to add members to

### members

`Address[]`
the addresses of the members to add
